title: Spiderman Layout Design
description: A visually striking Spider-Man landing page inspired by the Marvel Universe. Built using pure HTML and CSS, this layout focuses on layered backgrounds, clip-path shapes, and smooth floating animations to create depth and impact. Designed with clean structure and modern UI aesthetics, making it ideal for portfolios and creative frontend showcases.
